caption.title: Excel spreadsheet with estimated binding stability effects of watch list mutations against all the four antibodies (KZ52, Ab100, Ab114, and 13F6-1-2) and a number of nucleotide point mutations required in the genetic code of GP of Zaire ebolavirus (strain Mayinga-76; GenBank accession number AF086833) to observe each mutation.

caption.p: Click here for additional data file.
